Package ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.jca

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JCAAESCTR
    JCA-specific implementations of AES in Counter Mode.
    JCAAESKey
    Wrapper class for the AES key provided by the JCA framework.
    JCADHKey
    Abstract DH key using the JCA provider.
    JCADHKeyAgreement
    This class computes the shared secret of two parties using BigInteger.
    JCADHKeyPairGenerator
    Generates a public/private keypair for the Diffie-Hellman key exchange.
    JCADHPrivateKey
    Private key for the Diffie Hellman key exchange.
    JCADHPublicKey
    Public key for the Diffie Hellman key exchange.
    JCADSAKey
    Abstract class for a DSA signing (private) or verification (public) key using the JCA providers.
    JCADSAKeyPairGenerator
    Generates DSA KeyPairs via the JCA classes.
    JCADSAPrivateKey
    Wrapper class for the DSA signing (private) key using the JCA provider.
    JCADSAPublicKey
    Wrapper class for the DSA verification (public) key using the JCA provider.
    JCAHMACKey
    Abstract class for a HMAC tagging or verification key.
    JCAHMACKeyGenerator
    Generates MAC Key.
    JCAHMACSHA1
    The HMAC algorithm, as implemented by the Java Cryptography Extension.
    JCAHMACSHA256
    The HMAC algorithm, as implemented by the Java Cryptography Extension.
    JCAMPI
    Helper routines for multi-precision integers.
    JCAProvider
    The JCA crypto provider.
    JCARawDSA
    The DSA digital signature algorithm, as implemented by the Java Cryptography Architecture.
    JCARunTest  
    JCASecureRandom  
    JCASHA1
    The SHA-1 hash algorithm, as implemented by the Java Cryptography Architecture.
    JCASHA256
    The SHA-256 hash algorithm, as implemented by the Java Cryptography Architecture.
